name: JumpFist 3D Alpha
description:
A 3D...i wanna say platformer? based on the 2D steam release a few months back. I figured i'd learn unreal engine and give this a go. Please let me know your thoughts on the alpha and don't forget to follow my twitter for recent updates. Please note that this is only an alpha and i'm still learning. I still have a long way to go with this.

Your feedback is appreciated. Currently playable on windows. Sorry mac users ><

www.twitter.com/BoomCatStudios
